scenario_text.value:
Boy, that was a close one... It’s a good
thing you saw through them.

(If I hadn’t... I don’t want to think about
it, to be honest.)
Let’s hurry and look for the real deals.

Yeah, we’ve gotta rescue them soon... They
must be experiencing something pretty awful.
You’re right... Wake up, guys! You okay?!

Ngh... Huh? What have we been doing this
whole time?

Saki! Miu! And you’re real this time! I’m so
glad.

I feel like, we saw this funky vision for
ages and ages.

Miu... It’s okay, it was all just a bad
dream.

(...Everyone must have seen something awful.
Just how I saw Ryo and Shuuji.)

You shouldn’t move around too much. I’ll go
look for the others.

Yeah, I’m not sure I could get up if I wanted
to right now.

Takuma, Agumon... Sorry. Please take care of
them.
Leave it to me. You two just rest, okay?
